problems.title: Move Zeroes to End
problems.description:
Write a program to move all zeroes to the end of a given array while maintaining the relative order of non-zero elements.

Input Format:
First line contains n, the size of array.
Second line contains n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print the modified array with all zeroes moved to the end, space-separated.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
10
2 5 7 0 4 0 7 -5 8 0

Sample Output
2 5 7 4 7 -5 8 0 0 0

Explanation:
All zeroes are moved to the end while non-zero elements maintain their relative order.
hintsList: Use two pointers: one to track position for non-zero elements, another to traverse the array.
